DataElement.preferredName: Observation Performed Study Activity Body Position Code ISO21090.CD.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A coded value specifying the 3-dimensional spatial orientation of a subject during a particular observation. EXAMPLE(S): supine, trendelenburg, standing

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Observation Performed Study Activity Body Position Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Watching something and taking note of what happens.:Executed and carried through to completion.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active._The spatial property of a body; where it is or the way in which it is situated.:A symbol or combination of symbols which are given certain arbitrary meanings within a systematized collection of concepts used for data representation.
